perturbation.original_text:
INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
     CELEBRITY and CELEBRITY Personnel will act as an independent contractor in
     the performance of its duties under this Agreement. Accordingly, CELEBRITY
     will be responsible for payment of all federal, state, and local taxes on
     compensation paid under this Agreement, including income and social
     security taxes, unemployment insurance, and any other taxes due relative to
     Distributor's Personnel and any and all business license fees as may be
     required. This Agreement neither expressly nor impliedly creates a
perturbation.changed_text:
INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
     CELEBRITY and CELEBRITY Personnel will act as a worker in
     the performance of its duties under this Agreement. Accordingly, CELEBRITY
     will be responsible for payment of all federal, state, and local taxes on
     compensation paid under this Agreement, including income and social
     security taxes, unemployment insurance, and any other taxes due relative to
     Distributor's Personnel and any and all business license fees as may be
     required. This Agreement neither expressly nor impliedly creates a
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'independent contractor' to 'worker' blurs the lines of the intended relationship, potentially leading to misclassification under labor laws. The original term implies a specific legal and tax treatment; the changed term could imply employee status, creating ambiguity and enforcement issues.
perturbation.contradicted_law: IRS guidelines on independent contractor vs. employee classification, Nevada labor laws.

perturbation.original_text:
The CELEBRITY will have full release of liability in regards to
     product performance and/or law suites resulting from use of the product.
     This liability will remain the responsibility of the COMPANY and
     manufacturers.
perturbation.changed_text:
The CELEBRITY will have limited release of liability in regards to
     product performance and/or law suites resulting from use of the product.
     This liability will remain the shared responsibility of the COMPANY and
     manufacturers.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'full release' to 'limited release' introduces uncertainty about the extent of the CELEBRITY's liability. Changing 'the responsibility' to 'shared responsibility' blurs the lines of who has the liability in tort law. This is in contradiction to product liability laws, which require clear determination of liability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Nevada product liability laws, general principles of tort law regarding liability assignment.

perturbation.original_text:
Governing Law.  This Agreement was negotiated and is being contracted
           -------------           for in Nevada, and shall be governed by the laws of the State of
           Nevada, and the United States of America, notwithstanding any
           conflict-of-law provision to the contrary.
perturbation.changed_text:
Governing Principles.  This Agreement was negotiated and is being contracted
           -------------           for in Nevada, and shall be governed by the ethical guidelines of Nevada,
           and the United States of America, notwithstanding any
           conflict-of-law provision to the contrary.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Governing Law' with 'Governing Principles' and 'laws' with 'ethical guidelines' attempts to replace legal rules with non-binding ethical standards. This undermines the contract's enforceability since ethical guidelines are not legally binding in the same way statutes and case law are.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Basic principles of contract law, Nevada statutes regarding contract interpretation and enforcement.
